titleStmt.title: Heir followeth the coppie of the ressoning which was betuix the abbote of Crosraguell and John Knox, in Mayboill concern ing [sic] the masse, in the yeare of God, a thousand fiue hundreth thre scoir and two yeares.
titleStmt.author: Knox, John,
Kennedy, Quintin, 1520-1564.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Lekpreuik, and are to be solde at his hous, at the nether bow. Cum priuilegio.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print bleeding and show-through, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his hous, at the nether bow. Cum priuilegio.
